params.borrowRate: The current borrow rate for the asset

returns._0: Interest factor accumlated in the elapsedTime

params.borrows: The amount of borrows in the market
params.supply: The supplied amount of stablecoin for the asset

returns._0: The borrow rate percentage as a mantissa

params.borrows: The amount of borrows for the asset
params.supply: The supplied amount of stablecoin for the asset

returns._0: The utilization rate as a mantissa between

getBorrowInterestFactor(uint256,uint256).notice: Function to calculate the interest on debt balances

getBorrowRate(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the current borrow rate as a linear equation

getUtilRate(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the utilization rate of the market: `borrows / supply`
